nodes.text: Ebon Squadron was a starfighter squadron that flew TIE/LN starfighters in service to the Galactic Empire. Flown by pilots trained to use group strategies and tactics, the squadron's TIEs had improved targeting systems at the expense of maneuverability and defensive capabilities—which were among the poorest in the Imperial Navy.
Ebon Squadron was represented by a miniature in the Imperial Power-up Pack supplement to the initial release of the Star Wars PocketModel TCG in June 2007.
